articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum traded sideways all week, with the market offering only a few green shoots. Elsewhere, SBF looks set to testify on Tuesday.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Flat Again, Axie Infinity Sees Rare Jump

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: SushiSwap's Head Chef is calling for drastic measures to keep the DeFi project's future alive and well.
articles.title: Why Some SushiSwap Stakers Are Jumping Ship

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The class action suit alleges that MoonPay and Guy Oseary worked with Yuga Labs to covertly pay celebrities to boost the popular NFT project.
articles.title: Lawsuit Alleges Yuga Labs Conspired With Celebs Like Justin Bieber to Push Bored Ape NFTs

articles.description: The proof-of-reserves study was conducted by independent firm Mazars.
articles.title: Crypto.com Releases Data to Assure Clients It Holds One-to-One Reserves

articles.description: In the event of a worst-case scenario, FalconX said it has “decades of runway,” meaning that it has enough capital on hand to continue operating.
articles.title: Crypto Brokerage FalconX Discloses It Has Funds Stuck on FTX

articles.description: Clay Robbins of Slow Ventures, Soona Amhaz of Volt Capital, Sarah Guo of Conviction and formerly Greylock, and Alex Strzesniewski of AngelBlock joined Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Summit in San Francisco on November 3 for an extensive panel on raising venture money even during Crypto Winter.
articles.title: Raising in a Bear Market: Slow Ventures, Volt Capital, Conviction, AngelBlock at 0xpo Summit

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: In almost identical statements—one to the NYT and another on Twitter—the former FTX CEO denies trying to make UST and USDT lose their pegs to the dollar.
articles.title: SBF Denies He Tried to Attack Tether, 'Hunted' Three Arrows’ Terra Positions

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Relitigating the past, Binance boss CZ and ex-FTX CEO SBF again trade barbs over a business deal gone bad.
articles.title: 'No One Won': Binance CEO CZ Again Clashes With Sam Bankman-Fried

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The coffee giant’s new Starbucks Odyssey rewards program opened up for select beta testers ahead of expansion in 2023.
articles.title: Starbucks Sees 'Unprecedented Interest' as Polygon NFT Rewards Platform Launches

articles.description: Rishi Sunak’s government is pushing forward with plans to turn the United Kingdom into a global hub for crypto assets.
articles.title: UK Includes Crypto Assets in Financial Services Reform Package

articles.description: The former FTX CEO's decision comes after a public exchange of tweets with the committee's chair Maxine Waters.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried 'Willing' to Testify Before House Financial Services Committee

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Citing securities law, the SEC is now asking firms about any relevant exposure to the chaotic crypto industry.
articles.title: SEC Urges Firms to Disclose Crypto Exposure in New Letter

articles.description: The stablecoin wars rage on as Coinbase rolls out zero-fee conversions from Tether to Circle's USDC.

articles.title: Binance CEO CZ Takes On Renown Skeptic Paul Krugman In Cryptocurrency MasterClass

articles.description: Metaplex accused Magic Eden of attempting to take over the NFT protocol as power players battle over royalties and decentralization.
articles.title: Tensions Erupt Between Magic Eden and Metaplex Over Future of Solana NFTs

articles.description: Is it “game over” for Microsoft's purchase of Activision Blizzard, developers of Call of Duty?
articles.title: FTC Could Curb Microsoft's Metaverse Ambitions with Activision Lawsuit

articles.description: Crypto rose along with the U.S. stock market today.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Jump With Stocks on Jobs Report Release

articles.description: Amid complaints over its “malware” tool, as Art Blocks CEO Erick Calderon called it, the top NFT marketplace revises its stance.
articles.title: OpenSea Again Changes Course on NFT Royalties After More Creator Pushback

articles.description: The mother of the fallen FTX founder says her retirement has “nothing to do with” the crypto scandal.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried's Lawyer Parents to Drop Teaching at Stanford in 2023: Report

articles.description: Senators Elizabeth Warren and Tina Smith also wrote letters demanding answers from the FDIC and the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency.
articles.title: Senator Warren Wants the Fed to Answer for Banking Sector’s Ties to FTX

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Ethereum core developers have targeted spring for the network’s upcoming Shanghai upgrade. But to get users their money, they may have to make some sacrifices.
articles.title: Ethereum Devs Plan to Enable Staked ETH Withdrawals by March 2023

articles.description: Shibuya, which lets NFT owners interact with its original content, raised a seed round co-led by Andreessen Horowitz and Variant Fund.
articles.title: Pplpleasr’s Shibuya NFT Video Platform Raises $6.9M to Build the 'A24 of Web3'

articles.description: A new directive aims to even up tax reporting in the EU for crypto operators, but some say the new requirements will burden many firms.
articles.title: EU to 'Level Playing Field' for Crypto Firms With Uniform Tax Rules

articles.description: A judge in California has dismissed a lawsuit against Kim Kardashian and others for promoting crypto project EthereumMax.

articles.description: It will only impact Celsius users who stored their funds in custody accounts rather than the firm's interest-bearing Earn program.
articles.title: Bankruptcy Judge Orders Celsius to Return $44M in Cryptocurrencies

articles.description: The price surge comes on the heels of news that Nexo's Earn Interest Product has been suspended in eight U.S. states.
articles.title: Nexo Token Up 5% on Ethereum 'Smart Staking' Launch

articles.description: The Coinbase CEO was less than optimistic about the crypto exchange's financials for 2022, citing the ongoing bear market and FTX's collapse.
articles.title: Coinbase Revenue Will Be ‘Half or Less’ of Last Year’s: CEO Brian Armstrong

articles.description: The Terra and Luna crash in May ultimately upended the entire crypto ecosystem—including SBF's failed exchange FTX.
articles.title: NYC Prosecutors Probing Sam Bankman-Fried's Role in TerraUSD Collapse: Report

articles.description: After taking a harsher tone on Twitter, the Democratic leader left open the possibility of forcing the FTX founder to testify about the company's collapse.
articles.title: Congressional Subpoena for SBF 'Definitely on the Table', Says Rep. Maxine Waters

articles.description: Solana devs look to rebuild as they unwind DeFi on the network from Sam Bankman-Fried’s Serum, replace it with OpenBook, and plot a course for the future.
articles.title: Life After FTX: How Solana DeFi Is Starting Over—Without SBF’s Serum

articles.description: "The Legend of Cockpunch" is a fiction project from Ferriss, with all primary sale proceeds going to his charitable foundation.

articles.description: Rep. Ritchie Torres (D-NY) accused Gensler of being “singularly responsible” for failing to prevent FTX’s demise.

articles.description: The fall of FTX has increased scrutiny of the verifiable assets held by crypto exchanges.

articles.title: Top EU Commissioner: Some Crypto Advocates Favor 'Dangerous' Anti-Regulation Path

articles.description: Tax reporting platform Koinly has joined the growing list of crypto firms reducing their headcount amid the “challenging” market environment.

articles.description: The House Ethics Committee said it “found substantial evidence” that Cawthorn had promoted a cryptocurrency in which he had invested $150,000.
articles.title: GOP Congressman Cawthorn Fined for Promoting ‘Let’s Go Brandon’ Cryptocurrency

articles.description: Illa Da Producer accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Yuga Labs from presenter Alanna Roazzi-Laforet at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Moonbirds, Azuki, DeGods, and CloneX.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Bored Ape Yacht Club Wins NFT Project of the Year

articles.description: Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon accepted the industry achievement award from presenter Clara Tsao of Filecoin Foundation at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: Art Blocks Founder Wins Industry Achievement Award

articles.description: Rachel Weiss and Jackie Courtney accepted the Cryptie for BFF from presenter Rebecca Barkin of Lamina1 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were WomenRise, Boys Club, and The Hug.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: BFF Wins Diversity Award

articles.description: Katrina Wolfe accepted the Cryptie for Crypto Unicorns from presenter Avery Akkineni of Vayner3 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Stepn, Zed Run, and Blankos Block Party.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Crypto Unicorns Wins Game of the Year

articles.description: Marek Olszewski accepted the Cryptie for Celo from presenter Dan Roberts of Decrypt Media at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Ukraine DAO, Dream DAO, Proof of Protest, and Digital Diaspora.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: Celo Wins Social Impact Award

articles.description: Simone Berry and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie for People of Crypto's Metaverse Pride Parade from presenter Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Decentraland's Metaverse Fashion Week and Heal from The Sandbox and Code Green.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: People of Crypto Wins Metaverse Event of the Year

articles.description: Shirley Cedeno and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Doodles from presenters Igor Lilic and Gabriela Ramos Lilic of Breakout at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were RTFKT and Nike, Gmoney and Adidas, Tiffany and CryptoPunks, and TIMEpieces.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: Doodles Collab With Shopify Wins Mainstream Award

articles.description: Bradley Freeman and Christina Beltramini accepted the Cryptie for Lens Protocol from presenter Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Aave, dYdX, and OlympusDAO.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Lens Protocol Wins DeFi Project of the Year

articles.description: Shan Aggarwal accepted the Cryptie for Coinbase Ventures from presenter Amanda Cassatt of Serotonin at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Paradigm, a16z, and Polychain.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Coinbase Ventures Wins Investor of the Year

articles.description: Blocknative's Matt Cutler sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to tell his Web3 origin story and Blocknative's business—plus misconceptions in the crypto space.
articles.title: Blocknative CEO Matt Cutler at 0xpo Crossroads

articles.description: Lisa Rubin, a blockchain attorney with Paul Hastings, sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss legal misconceptions the industry still holds.
articles.title: Fintech Lawyer: Crypto Companies Need to Seek Legal Advice Before Launch

articles.description: One of the minds behind the popular Solana dapp sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss the history of Phantom and what he’s looking forward to in Web3.
articles.title: Phantom Co-Founder Francesco Agosti at 0xpo Crossroads

articles.description: "Lost Children of Andromeda" author Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry of Metagood and ACTAI Ventures, Artemysia-X of Rug Radio program LorePlay, and Kas Vegas of NFT INT, Huxley, and Feature.io all discussed how their work utilizes NFTs for storytelling, on a lively panel at Camp Decrypt moderated by What's Trending podcast host Shira Lazar.
articles.title: NFT Storytelling: Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry, Artemysia-X, Kas Vegas at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: In an extensive talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Decrypt in Napa CA in October, Edward Snowden gave his candid views on the Ethereum merge, the sanctioning of Ethereum mixer Tornado Cash by the U.S. government, the privacy shortcomings of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and his view on using DAOs to source tips from whistleblowers.
articles.title: Edward Snowden Talks Tornado Cash Sanctions, Ethereum Merge, DAOs and NFTs at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.
articles.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.
articles.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'

articles.description: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next

articles.description: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.
articles.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin

articles.description: As the unsung heroes of digital connectivity, APIs are the engine under the hood making all the interactivity we’ve come to expect online possible. In video five of the Infura Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn what blockchain APIs are, how they work, and explore the different types of APIs to improve your dapp’s connectivity. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is A Blockchain API?
